nodes.description: Describe each node of the cluster.

cluster_name.description: Address of the cluster. On this address, the Control Plane Endpoint is raised, and it is used in the calculated parameters.

control_plain.description: Specifies which addresses are to be available for Kubernetes.

internal.description: Internal network address for the connection. It is to be used for all internal kubeapi traffic.

external.description: External network address for the connection. It is to be used for serving and balancing external traffic and external connections.

public_cluster_ip.description: An obsolete variable that is used if you are using Helm plugins installation.

gateway_nodes.description: Specify the gateway nodes through which you need to create an SSH-tunnel.

vrrp_ips.description: List of VRRP IPs to assign to balancers. Each item can either be a simple address string or a dictionary with the address and additional parameters.

timeout_download.description: Timeout for the thirdparties download on nodes.

procedure_history.description: Parameters for the inventory preservation on nodes after each procedure run.

archive_threshold.description: Number of procedure runs after which the information about old runs is archived.

delete_threshold.description: Number of procedure runs after which the information about old runs is deleted.

values.description: Section to hold custom variables to be used in Jinja2 templates.
